publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1817 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn—That the Parliament notes with interest the conference to be held in Oban entitled Dr Iain Crichton Smith – A Tribute; recognises that this is the first in a series of cultural events held to promote the establishment of a Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn; believes that such a centre would provide a facility for local Gaelic organisations and act as a tourism resource promoting Gaelic language and culture, and welcomes any progress made in driving forward this innovative project. Note: The member who lodged this motion has provided the following translation: Ionad Culturail Gàidhlig airson an Obain agus Lathurna Gu bheil a’ Phàrlamaid a toirt fainear le ùidh an co-labhairt a tha gu bhith san Oban fon ainm An t-Oll. Iain Mac a’Ghobhainn – Moladh, gu bheil I ag aithneachadh gur e seo a’ chiad ann an sreath de thachartsan culturail ann a bhith cur air adhart Ionad Culturail Gàidhlig airson an Obain; a creidsinn gum biodh leithid a dh’ionad feumail do bhuidheannan Gàidhlig ionadail agus gun obraicheadh e mar ghoireas turasachd ann a bhith brosnachadh cànan is dualchas na Gàidhlig, agus a’ cur fàilte air adhartas sam bith ann a bhith toirt a’ phroiseict ùr-ghnàthach sa gu buil.
S1M-1817 Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn (lodged on 30 March 2001) Mr Alex Salmond*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1817 Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn (lodged on 30 March 2001) Kay Ullrich*, Michael Matheson*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-1817 Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn (lodged on 30 March 2001) Ms Sandra White*, Andrew Wilson*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-1817 Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn (lodged on 30 March 2001) Alex Neil*, Fiona Hyslop*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1817 Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn (lodged on 30 March 2001) Michael Russell*, Colin Campbell*

S1M-1817 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn—That the Parliament notes with interest the conference to be held in Oban entitled Dr Iain Crichton Smith – A Tribute; recognises that this is the first in a series of cultural events held to promote the establishment of a Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn; believes that such a centre would provide a facility for local Gaelic organisations and act as a tourism resource promoting Gaelic language and culture, and welcomes any progress made in driving forward this innovative project. Note: The member who lodged this motion has provided the following translation: Ionad Culturail Gàidhlig airson an Obain agus Lathurna Gu bheil a’ Phàrlamaid a toirt fainear le ùidh an co-labhairt a tha gu bhith san Oban fon ainm An t-Oll. Iain Mac a’Ghobhainn – Moladh, gu bheil I ag aithneachadh gur e seo a’ chiad ann an sreath de thachartsan culturail ann a bhith cur air adhart Ionad Culturail Gàidhlig airson an Obain; a creidsinn gum biodh leithid a dh’ionad feumail do bhuidheannan Gàidhlig ionadail agus gun obraicheadh e mar ghoireas turasachd ann a bhith brosnachadh cànan is dualchas na Gàidhlig, agus a’ cur fàilte air adhartas sam bith ann a bhith toirt a’ phroiseict ùr-ghnàthach sa gu buil. Supported by: Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Kay Ullrich, Michael Matheson, Irene McGugan, Ms Sandra White, Andrew Wilson, Roseanna Cunningham, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Alex Neil, Fiona Hyslop, Fiona McLeod, Michael Russell, Colin Campbell
S1M-1817 Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn (lodged on 30 March 2001) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-1817 Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn (lodged on 30 March 2001) Fergus Ewing*

Note: The member who lodged this motion has provided the following translation: Ionad Culturail Gàidhlig airson an Obain agus Lathurna Gu bheil a’ Phàrlamaid a toirt fainear le ùidh an co-labhairt a tha gu bhith san Oban fon ainm An t-Oll. Supported by: Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Kay Ullrich, Michael Matheson, Irene McGugan, Ms Sandra White, Andrew Wilson, Roseanna Cunningham, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Alex Neil, Fiona Hyslop, Fiona McLeod, Michael Russell, Colin Campbell, Dr Winnie Ewing, Fergus Ewing

S1M-1817 Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn (lodged on 30 March 2001) Rhoda Grant*

S1M-1817 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn—That the Parliament notes with interest the conference to be held in Oban entitled Dr Iain Crichton Smith – A Tribute; recognises that this is the first in a series of cultural events held to promote the establishment of a Gaelic Cultural Centre for Oban and Lorn; believes that such a centre would provide a facility for local Gaelic organisations and act as a tourism resource promoting Gaelic language and culture, and welcomes any progress made in driving forward this innovative project.
